name: Mr. Final Boss
description:
The legends say that one day, brave Heroes will slay the evil and malicious Ignatius, the Chaos Bringer... But YOU won't go down without a fight! Be the bossfight everyone is dreading and hunt down as many Heroes as you can in your last stand using a variety of abilities you can choose from!

Features:

 Choose from 8 abilities, designed to bring chaos in different ways 

Procedurally generated Heroes with different gameplay styles, fashion and personalities

 Stylish mix of 3D graphics with pixelart

 Pretty epic in general

Controls:

 WASD - Movement

 LMB/RMB - Abilities

Developers:

 Programming - Duckonaut, Enjl, Oroshibu

 Art - Daim, Nomis, Trensient, Aneckdope, IbanPlay

 Music - Viktor Kraus

 SFX - Plusma

Made in 72 hours for LUDUM DARE 50, theme - "Delay the Inevitable"
